# Tracely

A tool for parsing ethereum debug_traceTransaction Result.

## Usage

`tracely -r rpc -t txID`  
  
Example:  
`tracely -r http://127.0.0.1:8545 -t 0x7b3cb706b2da1356daaad40860948800870b2df1201a42be9cb274b2eca61053`

## Example Result

```
DELEGATECALL address 0x0bc5ae2ec2fc1de4c729e338f35b0a644b484dc8, gas 114894, payload c0476efd000000000000000000000000fab3b17edf35168d102b1730805b6f93911f8f80000000000000000000000000a7d7079b0fead91f3e65f86e8915cb59c1a4c66400000000000000000000000016272d6224c30a157530cb46e1ee9a1ddeed72f4ffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffff
```
